urls.description: Rory Stewart, former cabinet minister and candidate for London Mayor, discusses the UK government's response to the coronavirus.

text:
To all the Tory apologists who say BJ is doing a great job and we can't use hindsight, here's Rory Stewart.

From 12 March. 

He predicts everything Johnson has done wrong.

https://t.co/liIwHfLdq5
